ygData.subject: Re: Part of a rune
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/21/99 1:27:46 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... It is a a quest for some warrior only armor (with VERY high AC...  The Crafted breastplate is
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/21/99 1:27:46 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
dtaber@... writes:

> Yesterday in Runnyeye my group managed to kill one of the evil eyes that
> attacked. I looted the body and found "Top part of a rune". The item
> is a lore item which is also "no drop" (it can not be traded, dropped,
> or sold).
>
> We continued fighting there the rest of the night and killed another
> evil eye. This one had "Middle part of a rune". This is also a lore
> item but is not listed as "no drop", so the group gave this part to me
> also.
>
> I have also heard these pieces have been found in South Karanas.
>
> Now I am assuming there is also a "Bottom part of a rune", but does
> anyone know what these are for? Is it a quest somewhere to assemble
> this rune? If so, what rune?

It is a a quest for some warrior only armor (with VERY high AC... The
Crafted breastplate is AC 22) The quest can be found in the Centaur Village
in South Karana.

Sonoroud Tomebinder.
